_header: We shall bid for the pope of Rome
Subjects: prayers, bidding; curses; prayers, for the nation; satire
_description: Prayers and curses for various groups of people — six 8-line stanzas

OxfLinLat130.First Lines:
We scholl bydde ffor þe pope of rome& for all þe
                    cardenales þat buþ some…
OxfLinLat130.Last Lines:
… Þat hy habbe & all suchCrystes cors &
                    myne
